long_description: These artificial raingutters create a base on which to mount 1A Raingutter Towers to camper shells or caps. Allows your Yakima rack to sit nice and low by attaching Towers to the sides of your camper shell. Custom installation is relatively straight-forward, but does involve drilling a few holes. All mounting hardware and instructions included. For a complete rack, you also need 1 set of 1A Raingutter Towers and 1 pair of Yakima crossbars, sold separately. Depending on your vehicle and situation, you may need 1 pair or 2 pairs of Wide Body Brackets; refer to Yakima's Fit List for fit information.
short_description: These artificial raingutters create a base on which to mount 1A Raingutter Towers to camper shells or caps.
